variable.name: SAMPLE_USE
variable.description: Sample use. Array_CNV: CNV genotypes obtained using standard or custom microarrays; Array_DNA_Methylation: Genome-wide DNA methylation profiling using methylation arrays, quantitative methylation measurements at the single-CpG-site level; Array_SNP: SNP genotypes obtained using standard or custom microarrays; Seq_Amplicon: Amplicon sequencing; Seq_DNA_WholeExome: Whole exome sequencing; Seq_RNA: Whole transcriptome sequencing
